subject: Medicine
title: Expectation and the Brain
description: A 60-second lesson on Expectation and the Brain.

hook.text: Your brain starts working before a pill even dissolves.

buildup.text: Expecting relief activates the prefrontal cortex.

discovery.text: This region sends signals that dampen pain processing.

twist.text: The stronger the expectation, the bigger the brain response.

climax.text: Brain imaging confirms that belief reshapes neural activity.

punchline.text: Your brain fills the prescription first.

quiz.question: What brain region activates when expecting relief from a placebo?
